item.title: Mentioned by Ottawa Citizen
item.description:
MP Gord Brown proposes bill to help historic sites raise money for restoration
Conservative MP Gord Brown, who represents Leeds Grenville, through which much of the Rideau Canal passes, has introduced a private member's bill that would permit national historic sites, such as the canal, to issue charitable receipts for donations ...
